DOC.brief_summary: The purpose protocol make Stanate ( TM ) [ stannsoporfin , tin-mesoporphyrin ] available infant meet follow criterion : 1. infant high level bilirubin without adequate clinical response phototherapy ; 2. infant require exchange transfusion ; 3. family refuse allow administration blood product , particularly religious ground , within Jehovah 's Witness community .
DOC.criteria: Term near term neonate Elevated serum bilirubin Failing phototherapy Requires exchange transfusion Family refuse exchange transfusion religious ground
